alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 24 at 1:52PM MDT until July 25 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Colorado, including the following area, Pueblo County. * WHEN...Until Midnight MDT tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Strong thunderstorms will develop over the higher terrain this afternoon and spread eastward into Pueblo County by mid afternoon. Very heavy rainfall rates of up to 3 inches per hour will be possible which may cause flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
